Title: Restricts election day duties of board of elections employees in the city of New York running for elected party positions
Summary: Relates to restricting election day duties of board of elections employees in the city of New York running for elected party positions; provides that no board of elections employee in the city of New York shall engage in any election day operations or management within any assembly district in which he or she is also a candidate for an elected party position.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to restricting election day duties of board of elections employees in the city of New York running for elected party positions
